text: Aaron Burns (born January 28, 1985 in Houston, Texas) is an American film producer, actor, film director, screenwriter, film editor, and cinematographer. Burns is a frequent collaborator with horror director Eli Roth. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
